Articles.Content: I am looking through the SpacePort trying to find a docking port mod that will allow my Kerbonauts to transfer from one vehicle to another when docked (similar to the Apollo CM/LEM or the Shuttle/Mir) so I don't have to EVA them across. So far, no such luck. Any suggestions? Thank you for your help.

Crew Manifest lets you move Kerbals(/Kermen?) amongst your crew boxes, but it isn't available on Spaceport.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/60936
I did see that one on Spaceport, and it seems to be the best (only) option I have found so far. Having never used a mod before, is it something that I would be able to fumble through fairly easily?

Mods are very, very easy to install. There is usually a gamedata folder in the data you download, just put everything in there in the gamedata folder in your KSP installation.

Tu uninstall just delete those files you moved.
The spaceport version is deprecated, there is an updated version in this thread
It is a very easy mod to use. I can't imagine playing KSP without it now. I think it's a bit ridiculous that transferring crew internally is not stock yet.
